meanings.definition: (adjective) of, relating to, or characterized by an epiphytotic disease outbreak
meanings.sent1: The epiphytotic disease spread quickly through the forest.
meanings.sent2: The farmers were worried about the epiphytotic outbreak affecting their crops.
meanings.sent3: The epiphytotic disease seemed to have a party on the plants!
meanings.sent4: The epiphytotic situation in the garden was like a wildfire, unstoppable and destructive.
meanings.sent5: The image of the epiphytotic disease taking over the fields was haunting.

meanings.definition: (noun) an epiphytotic disease outbreak causing widespread damage to plants
meanings.sent1: The epiphytotic led to a significant loss of vegetation.
meanings.sent2: The region suffered greatly from the epiphytotic that year.
meanings.sent3: The epiphytotic outbreak turned the garden into a chaotic mess!
meanings.sent4: The epiphytotic in the greenhouse was like a storm, leaving devastation in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the epiphytotic outbreak haunted the farmers for years to come.
